remarks: Closed form of ~ hbxfrbi .  Notes: it is less important than ~ bj-nfbi ; it requires ~ sp (unlike ~ bj-nfbi ); there is an obvious version with ` ( E. x ph -> ph ) ` instead.  (Contributed by BJ, 6-May-2019.)
statement: bj-hbxfrbi $p |- ( A. x ( ph <-> ps ) -> ( ( ph -> A. x ph ) <-> ( ps -> A. x ps ) ) ) $.
